asset.prompt: A cinematic, hyper-detailed, slightly unsettling upper-body character portrait of Dr. Frank N. Stone. He is a short man with wrinkled skin, bloodshot eyes, and bushy black hair like a scouring pad. His expression is a twisted, evil grin. He is wearing a dirty lab coat. The scene is illuminated by a sickly green glow from below, creating a mad scientist atmosphere. The overall style emphasizes his unpleasant facial features.
